data.text:
Harold Lloyd HELMS was born on 23 January 1910 in Daviess Co., Missouri. He died on 13 July 1962 at the age of 52 in Benton Twp., Daviess, Missouri. He was buried on 16 July 1962 in Civil Bend Cemetery, Daviess, Missouri. His mother was Margaret.

Spouse: Flora Ellen STITT. Flora Ellen STITT and Harold Lloyd HELMS were married on 25 March 1935. Children were: Della Margaret HELMS.

Inez HELMS was born about 1893 in Missouri. Parents: Everett Y. HELMS and unknown .J. D. HELMS was born (date unknown).

Spouse: Betty AUSTIN. Betty AUSTIN and J. D. HELMS were married.

J. M. HELMS was born (date unknown). Parents: M. C. HELMS and Elizabeth MABRY.John W. HELMS was born about 1905 in Missouri. Parents: William Abraham HELMS and Louida May "Ida" JEFFRIES.Joseph HELMS was born (date unknown). Parents: M. C. HELMS and Elizabeth MABRY.Lula B. HELMS was born about 1909 in Pattonsburg, Daviess, Missouri. Parents: William Abraham HELMS and Louida May "Ida" JEFFRIES.Lulu Virginia HELMS was born on 8 November 1865 in Virginia. She died on 14 September 1946 at the age of 80 in St. Joseph, Buchanan, Missouri. She was buried on 16 September 1946 in Mt. Auburn, Buchanan, Missouri. Parents: M. C. HELMS and Elizabeth MABRY.

Spouse: Samuel R. SURFACE. Lulu Virginia HELMS and Samuel R. SURFACE were married on 27 December 1888 in Daviess Co., Missouri. Children were: Cress SURFACE, Samuel Clite SURFACE.

M. C. HELMS died in 1912 in Daviess Co., Missouri. He was buried in Bates Co., Missouri.

Spouse: Elizabeth MABRY. Elizabeth MABRY and M. C. HELMS were married. Children were: Lulu Virginia HELMS, Ed HELMS, A. M. HELMS, Joseph HELMS, J. M. HELMS, Eva HELMS.

M. K. HELMS was born about 1841 in Illinois.

Spouse: unknown . Unknown and M. K. HELMS were married. Children were: Everett Y. HELMS.

Mamie L. HELMS was born about 1912 in Missouri. Parents: William Abraham HELMS and Louida May "Ida" JEFFRIES.Manitia Lee HELMS was born on 17 May 1863 in Platte Co., Missouri. She died on 27 March 1946 at the age of 82 in Polo, Caldwell, Missouri. She was buried on 29 March 1946 in Bethel Cemetery, Caldwell, Missouri. Parents: Finis E. HELMS and Mary WILLIAMS.

Spouse: Robert C. RUSSELL. Manitia Lee HELMS and Robert C. RUSSELL were married on 15 September 1889 in Caldwell Co., Missouri. The bride was of Ray Co., the groom of Caldwell Co. Children were: Roscoe B. RUSSELL, Flora RUSSELL.

Marjorie M. HELMS was born about 1926 in Missouri. Parents: Willis Clarence HELMS and Ethel C. COLLINS.Martha Lorene HELMS was born about 1903 in Missouri. She died on 27 September 1993 at the age of 90 in St. Joseph, Buchanan, Missouri. She was buried on 3 October 1993 in Oak Lawn Cemetery, Maysville, Missouri. Parents: Ruben HELMS and Ella RICE.

Spouse: Joseph Marit GITTHENS. Martha Lorene HELMS and Joseph Marit GITTHENS were married on 8 January 1921 in Maysville, DeKalb, Missouri. Children were: Verl J. GITTHENS, Alta Lorene GITTHENS, Vernon M. GITTHENS.

Martha S. HELMS was born on 26 February 1861 in Taney Co., Missouri. She died on 23 January 1928 at the age of 66 in Polo, Caldwell, Missouri. She was buried on 24 January 1928 in Prairie Ridge Cemetery, Caldwell, Missouri. Parents: Finis E. HELMS and Mary WILLIAMS.

Spouse: Armstead Early SLOAN. Martha S. HELMS and Armstead Early SLOAN were married about 1891.

Mary HELMS was born about 1812 in Ohio.

Spouse: Thomas Benton LUKEHART. Mary HELMS and Thomas Benton LUKEHART were married. Children were: Martha E. LUKEHART, Harriett E. LUKEHART, Mary A. LUKEHART, John LUKEHART, Elizabeth Jane LUKEHART, Joseph Jasper LUKEHART, Thomas B. LUKEHART.

Mary M. HELMS was born about 1901 in Daviess Co., Missouri. She died in 1973 at the age of 72. She was buried in Cheyenne, Laramie, Wyoming. Parents: William Abraham HELMS and Louida May "Ida" JEFFRIES.

Spouse: Clyde T. FEURT. Mary M. HELMS and Clyde T. FEURT were married on 5 April 1921 in Gallatin, Daviess, Missouri. Bride and groom were of Jameson. L. B. Gillihan, guardian of Clyde, consents. Children were: Richard A. FEURT, George Robert FEURT.

Ralph C. HELMS was born about 1918 in Missouri. Parents: Willis Clarence HELMS and Ethel C. COLLINS.Rosa HELMS was born (date unknown). Parents: D. T. "Taz" HELMS and Lora BAUER.

Spouse: PERSINGER. Rosa HELMS and PERSINGER were married.

Ruben HELMS was born (date unknown).

Spouse: Ella RICE. Ella RICE and Ruben HELMS were married. Children were: Martha Lorene HELMS.

Sarah HELMS was born about 1884 in Missouri.

Spouse: Lewis S. CHADWICK. Sarah HELMS and Lewis S. CHADWICK were married about 1905. Children were: Laura May CHADWICK, Claude Gilbert CHADWICK.

Stella E. HELMS was born about 1903 in Daviess Co., Missouri. Parents: William Abraham HELMS and Louida May "Ida" JEFFRIES.

Spouse: William Ross FEURT. Stella E. HELMS and William Ross FEURT were married. Children were: Robert Dean FEURT.

William Abraham HELMS was born in January 1872 in Missouri. He was a salesman in a Pattonsburg store in 1910.

Spouse: Louida May "Ida" JEFFRIES. Louida May "Ida" JEFFRIES and William Abraham HELMS were married on 3 January 1892 in DeKalb Co., Missouri. The bride was of Daviess Co., the groom of DeKalb Co. John J. Helms, father of William, consents to this marriage. Soham Jeffries, father of Louida, consents. Children were: Willis Clarence HELMS, George L. HELMS, Claude Dewey HELMS, Mary M. HELMS, Stella E. HELMS, John W. HELMS, William Doyle HELMS, Lula B. HELMS, Mamie L. HELMS.

William Doyle HELMS was born about 1907 in Missouri. Parents: William Abraham HELMS and Louida May "Ida" JEFFRIES.Willis Clarence HELMS was born on 8 October 1892 in Pattonsburg, Daviess, Missouri. In 1917 he described himself as tall and slender with blue eyes and brown hair. Parents: William Abraham HELMS and Louida May "Ida" JEFFRIES.

Spouse: Ethel C. COLLINS. Ethel C. COLLINS and Willis Clarence HELMS were married on 20 August 1911 in Pattonsburg, Daviess, Missouri. The groom was of Pattonsburg, the bride of Jefferson Twp. W. A. Helms, father of Clarence, consents. Children were: Harley C. HELMS, Elva L. HELMS, Ralph C. HELMS, Marjorie M. HELMS, Elma A. HELMS.

HELPHLEY was born (date unknown).

Spouse: Jennie Mae AMICK. Jennie Mae AMICK and HELPHLEY were married.

HEMAN was born (date unknown).

Spouse: Frances Jean EADS. Frances Jean EADS and HEMAN were married.

HEMBROFF was born (date unknown).

Spouse: Florence SHEPHERD. Florence SHEPHERD and HEMBROFF were married.

Jason HEMBRY was born (date unknown). Parents: Noah Ray HEMBRY and Nancy JONES.Noah Ray HEMBRY was born on 18 April 1939 in Arkansas. He died on 29 May 1999 at the age of 60 in Kansas City, Jackson, Missouri. He was buried on 5 June 1999. His body was left to KU Anatomy and Cell Biology. He was a son of Noah Edward Hembry.

Spouse: Nancy JONES. Nancy JONES and Noah Ray HEMBRY were married in 1963. Children were: Jason HEMBRY.

HEMINGER was born (date unknown).

Spouse: Ruth BARGAR. Ruth BARGAR and HEMINGER were married.

HEMPHILL was born (date unknown).

Spouse: Iris SPENCER.

Jo Ellen HEMPHILL was born (date unknown). Parents: William P. HEMPHILL and Janice NICKERSON.William P. HEMPHILL was born (date unknown).

Spouse: Janice NICKERSON. Janice NICKERSON and William P. HEMPHILL were married. Children were: Jo Ellen HEMPHILL.

Katherine Hanna HEMRICH was born on 22 September 1891 in King Co., Washington. She died on 9 April 1969 at the age of 77 in Seattle, King, Washington. She was buried in Seattle, King, Washington.

Spouse: Wilbur William SCRUBY. Katherine Hanna HEMRICH and Wilbur William SCRUBY were married on 21 August 1912 in Seattle, King, Washington.

Abraham HEMRY was born on 12 June 1792 in Pennsylvania. He was probably born in Loudon County, Virginia. He died on 30 March 1867 at the age of 74 in Allen County, Indiana.

Spouse: Catherine SCHUMAN. Catherine SCHUMAN and Abraham HEMRY were married on 15 January 1818 in Harrison Co., Ohio. Children were: Margaret A. HEMRY, Simon HEMRY, Israel HEMRY, Nancy E. HEMRY, Isaac Newton HEMRY, Haman HEMRY, Solomon HEMRY, John HEMRY, Mary Ellen HEMRY.

Addie Eleanor HEMRY was born on 24 April 1884 in Gomer Twp., Caldwell, Missouri. She died on 12 January 1939 at the age of 54 in Gomer Twp., Caldwell, Missouri. She was buried on 14 January 1939 in Highland Cemetery, Caldwell, Missouri. Parents: Isaac Milfred HEMRY and Sarah Jane WHITSELL.

Spouse: Ernest Sylvester ELY. Addie Eleanor HEMRY and Ernest Sylvester ELY were married on 26 July 1905 in Hamilton, Caldwell, Missouri. Children were: Milford Hemby ELY, Maurice Elton ELY, Donald Lee ELY, Doris Gene ELY.

Albert H. HEMRY was born on 16 December 1876 in Polo, Caldwell, Missouri. He died on 11 February 1879 at the age of 2 in Hamilton, Caldwell, Missouri. Parents: William A. HEMRY and Emma Margaret RICHARDSON.Augusta HEMRY was born on 11 August 1864 in Daviess Co., Missouri. She died on 15 May 1939 at the age of 74 in Gallatin, Daviess, Missouri. She was buried on 17 May 1939 in Brown Cemetery, Daviess, Missouri. She never married. Parents: Thomas H. HEMRY and Sarah Ann Frances PAYNE.Belle Everette HEMRY was born on 23 March 1860 in Ray Co., Missouri. She died on 25 January 1922 at the age of 61 in Hamilton, Caldwell, Missouri. She was buried on 26 January 1922 in Highland Cemetery, Caldwell, Missouri. Parents: Haman HEMRY and Eliza Jane MCDONALD.

Spouse: John GIBSON. Belle Everette HEMRY and John GIBSON were married about 1880. Children were: Herbert Lauraine GIBSON, Mae Belle GIBSON.

Bertha May HEMRY was born on 12 May 1897 in Hamilton, Caldwell, Missouri. She died in 1966 at the age of 69. Parents: Isaac Milfred HEMRY and Sarah Jane WHITSELL.

Spouse: C. H. EDWARDS. Bertha May HEMRY and C. H. EDWARDS were married.

Bessie HEMRY was born (date unknown). Parents: Haman HEMRY and Eliza Jane MCDONALD.Bessie HEMRY was born in 1909 in Hamilton, Caldwell, Missouri. Parents: Raymond "Ray" HEMRY and Mattie L. COOK.Bina Jane HEMRY was born on 28 March 1889 in Hamilton, Caldwell, Missouri. She died on 23 September 1960 at the age of 71 in Hamilton, Caldwell, Missouri. She was buried on 25 September 1960 in Highland Cemetery, Caldwell, Missouri. She was a school administrator. She never married. Parents: Isaac Milfred HEMRY and Sarah Jane WHITSELL.Carol Elaine HEMRY was born on 3 April 1972 in St. Joseph, Buchanan, Missouri. Parents: Warren Randall HEMRY and Joyce Carol THOMAS.Caroline HEMRY was born on 16 September 1851 in Daviess Co., Missouri. She died on 2 December 1885 at the age of 34 in Caldwell Co., Missouri. Parents: Rezin HEMRY and Elizabeth H. RAMSBOTTOM.

Spouse: John Walker BAKER. Caroline HEMRY and John Walker BAKER were married on 3 January 1875. Children were: John William BAKER, Rezin Hemry BAKER, James Virgil BAKER.

Charles HEMRY was born on 18 November 1869 in Hamilton Twp., Caldwell, Missouri. He died on 24 March 1929 at the age of 59 in Pulaski Co., Missouri. He was buried on 26 March 1929 in Highland Cemetery, Caldwell, Missouri. Parents: Haman HEMRY and Eliza Jane MCDONALD.

Spouse: Jessie May COOPER. Jessie May COOPER and Charles HEMRY were married on 11 March 1890 in Caldwell Co., Missouri.

Charles Everett HEMRY was born on 20 May 1870 in Monroe Twp., Daviess, Missouri. He died on 18 September 1944 at the age of 74 in Kansas City, Jackson, Missouri. His usual residence was in Kansas City. He was buried on 20 September 1944 in Hillcrest Cemetery, Daviess, Missouri. He was a cashier in a Gallatin bank in 1900. In 1910 he was bank president. Parents: Thomas H. HEMRY and Sarah Ann Frances PAYNE.

Spouse: Ada N. MACY. Ada N. MACY and Charles Everett HEMRY were married on 19 December 1909 in Gallatin, Daviess, Missouri. Bride and groom were of Gallatin. Children were: Dorotha Valentine HEMRY, Mary Charlene HEMRY.

Spouse: Martha Lou Etta MORRIS. Martha Lou Etta MORRIS and Charles Everett HEMRY were married.

Charles Everett HEMRY was born on 9 October 1908 in Union Twp., Daviess, Missouri. He died after 1973 at the age of 65. He was Assistant Cashier at First National Bank of Gallatin. Parents: Martin A. HEMRY and Eva KECK.

Spouse: Evelyn Roxanne "Romane" BROWN. Evelyn Roxanne "Romane" BROWN and Charles Everett HEMRY were married on 10 July 1937 in Jameson, Daviess, Missouri. The groom was of Gallatin, the bride of Jameson. Children were: Warren Randall HEMRY, Don Alden HEMRY, Martha Elaine HEMRY.

Chauncie L. HEMRY was born about 1884 in Missouri. Parents: Isaac Newton HEMRY and Sarah "Sally" THOMPSON.
